title: test: add gptimage edit mode regression test
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Safety net for edits
gist.blurb: Added regression tests for gptimage editing to keep the pixels flowing correctly.
gist.summary: Added integration tests for `gptimage` edit mode to prevent future regressions.
gist.impact: Ensures stability for image editing features during future updates.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot acting as a QA tester, inspecting a painting process.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a clipboard and checking a robotic arm painting a canvas. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'TEST PASS'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a clipboard and checking a robotic arm painting a canvas. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'TEST PASS'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
